summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road. Various vehicles and individuals are present on both sides of the road. The vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position throughout the segment.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position, ensuring safe navigation through the urban environment. The vehicle does not exhibit any sudden changes in speed or direction, indicating a cautious driving approach.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward. 2) Right side: A black car, approximately 10 meters away, parked. 3) Front: A red tricycle, approximately 15 meters away, moving forward. 4) Right side: A green motorcycle, approximately 20 meters away, parked.
